channel.title: Posts on Robert Franklin
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Robert Franklin

item.title: First post
item.description: First post Welcome to the blog. Here, I want to provide a place to post whatever interesting thoughts I have about data, psychology, philosophy, and whatever educational resources I can find. I’ve listed resources for R elsewhere on the site, but I will post whatever I find interesting here. If you’re reading this, you may be my student, (because I made you read it!), or someone who found this through something else.
